# mypkgr

The goal of mypkgr is to help you finding the love of your life.

## Installation

You can install the development version of mypkgr from
[GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Loucami/mypkgr")
```

# Package index

## All functions

- [`mvnpdf()`](https://loucami.github.io/mypkgr/reference/mvnpdf.md) :
  MVNPDF
- [`mvnpdfsmart()`](https://loucami.github.io/mypkgr/reference/mvnpdfsmart.md)
  : MVNPDFSMART
- [`plot(`*`<mvnpdf>`*`)`](https://loucami.github.io/mypkgr/reference/plot.mvnpdf.md)
  : Plot of the mvnpdf function
- [`plot(`*`<mvnpdfsmart>`*`)`](https://loucami.github.io/mypkgr/reference/plot.mvnpdfsmart.md)
  : Plot of the mvnpdfsmart function
